name: BIQTIris
description: Reference iris image quality algorithm limited to 640x480 and 480x480 images.

attributes.name: quality
attributes.description: Measure of the quality of the iris image.

attributes.name: sharpness
attributes.description: Raw score quantifying the sharpness of the image.

attributes.name: normalized_sharpness
attributes.description: Normalized [0,1] score quantifying the sharpness of the image.

attributes.name: contrast
attributes.description: Raw score quantifying overall image contrast.

attributes.name: normalized_contrast
attributes.description: Normalized [0,1] score quantifying overall image contrast.

attributes.name: iris_pupil_gs
attributes.description: Measure of the grayscale difference between the iris and pupil.

attributes.name: normalized_iris_sclera_gs
attributes.description: Normalized measure of the grayscale difference between the iris and pupil, used in quality computations.

attributes.name: iris_sclera_gs
attributes.description: Raw measure quantifying how distinguishable the boundary is between the iris and the sclera.

attributes.name: normalized_iris_sclera_gs
attributes.description: Normalized [0,1] measure quantifying how distinguishable the boundary is between the iris and the sclera.

attributes.name: iris_diameter
attributes.description: Raw diameter of the iris measured in pixels.

attributes.name: normalized_iris_diameter
attributes.description: Normalized [0,1] value measuring how large the iris is relative the image.

attributes.name: normalized_percent_visible_iris
attributes.description: Normalized percent of the iris which is visible (not obscured by the eyelid, lashes, etc.), used in quality comptuatioins

attributes.name: percent_visible_iris
attributes.description: Percent of the iris which is visible (not obscured by the eyelid, lashes, etc.)

attributes.name: image_width
attributes.description: Width, in pixels, of the image.

attributes.name: image_height
attributes.description: Height, in pixels, of the image.
